skills.Name: Triple Thrust: Death Mark
skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.

skills.Name: Curse of Divinity: Death Mark
skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.

skills.Name: Rapier Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 20.08 when using a short sword.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 2.2 and Evasion by 3, and decreases the enemy's Critical Rate/Damage by 5%.

skills.Name: Magic Immunity
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 41 and Resistance to magic damage by 5.

skills.Name: Soul Mastery
skills.Description: Absorbs souls. 294 or more XP is needed to absorb a soul. There is a 15% chance of absorbing an additional soul on a Critical. Maximum of 12 souls can be absorbed.

skills.Name: Life to Soul
skills.Description: Cannibalizes your own life to increase your soul by 1.

skills.Name: Triple Thrust
skills.Description: Rapidly jabs the enemy three times dealing 460 Physical Damage.

skills.Name: Shining Edge
skills.Description: Attacks the target's vital points with 740 Power added to P. Atk. Increases Power upon the consumption of up to 5 souls. Requires a short sword to be equipped. Requires 2 stacks of Death Mark.

skills.Name: Curse of Divinity
skills.Description: Devastate your target with a curse that erupts the divine energy within them and deals 650 Dark Physical Damage. Increases Spd. +40, Evasion +5, Rear Critical Damage +30%% and Critical Skill Rate by 30%% for 5 seconds.

skills.Name: Dark Flame
skills.Description: Inflicts dark damage on the enemies in front dealing 560 Dark Physical Damage and slows the targets by 30% for 5 seconds. Requires 1 Death Mark.

skills.Name: Hide
skills.Description: Who's there? Stealth for 15 seconds.

skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 20.08 when using a short sword.

skills.Name: Soul Web
skills.Description: Spreads a soul net to decrease Speed near the enemy by 60% for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Shadow Bind
skills.Description: Catches the enemy's shadow and inflicts hold for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Soul Rage
skills.Description: Gathers souls and attacks the enemy by hurling projectiles. Possible up to level 40. Critical hit and over-hit are possible.

skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.
